resources.string: [Function Description] \nEnable accessibility permissions to take screenshots for translation.\nWhen granting permissions, a warning will pop up. Please rest assured that Mengyi will not collect any of your information.

It looks like your Android version is less than Android 11 (API 30) or Harmony OS version is less than 3.0, which means that you cannot use the translation function of this software, but you can still use other functions except translation. If you want to experience all the functions of this software, please upgrade the system or change the device.
Do you want to update now? Click Update to jump to the official website of MoeTranslate. Click Download on the official website to get the latest version.

It looks like you have selected NLLB as the translation model, but it seems that the NLLB model file has not been downloaded yet, so translation is not possible. Click Go to Download to enter the download page; of course, you can also choose other translation APIs to use the translation function.

It looks like you have selected Baidu Translate as the translation API, but it seems that you have not configured it yet, so translation is not possible. Click Config to enter the API settings page; of course, you can also select other translation APIs to use the translation function.

It looks like you have used a custom translation API, but it seems that you have not configured it yet, so translation is not possible. Click Config to enter the API settings page; of course, you can also choose other translation APIs to use the translation function.

It looks like you have selected Tencent Cloud as the translation API, but it seems that you have not configured it yet, so translation is not possible. Click Config to enter the API settings page; of course, you can also select other translation APIs to use the translation function.

It seems that you have not granted MoeTranslate accessibility permissions. Screenshot Translation requires accessibility permissions to take screenshots. Click to grant accessibility permissions to grant the app.

The specific authorization path varies slightly on devices of different brands, roughly:
General tab → Downloaded apps → Find "MoeTranslateTranslation Service" → Use "MoeTranslate Translation Service".
When granting permissions, a warning will pop up. Please rest assured that MoeTranslate will not collect any of your information.

It seems that you have not granted MoeTranslate floating window permission. Screenshot Translation needs to obtain floating window permission to display the floating ball anytime and anywhere. Click to grant to grant the app floating window permission. 

The specific authorization path is roughly: 
find "MoeTranslate" in the list → grant MoeTranslate the permission to "display on top of other applications".
It seems that you have not granted MoeTranslate notification permission. Screenshot Translation requires notification permission. Click Grant to grant the app notification permission.
Network Error, please check and try again
Failed to get notification, maybe the network is not connected
Select the translation mode you wish to use

Perform offline OCR locally to extract text from the image, and then translate the text. Supports local AI offline text translation, as well as the use of preset cloud text translation APIs and custom cloud text translation APIs. Note that offline OCR recognition only supports Chinese, Japanese, and English. This method consumes very little data traffic; if you choose to process it completely locally, you can even do it completely offline.

Upload the screenshot directly to the cloud API for translation. It supports using the preset cloud image translation API, and also supports using the custom cloud image translation API. It does not support local translation. This method consumes relatively more data traffic.
The machine learning suite launched by Google runs on the device side, without the need for a network, and is click-and-use. Translation is a function of this machine learning suite.

Meta\'s model is designed for translation. The full name is \"No Language Left Behind\". As the name suggests, it supports multiple languages. This model has better translation effect, but it needs to be downloaded before use. Click \"Manage NLLB model files\" below to download and delete model files. To use this model, the device must have at least 8GB of RAM.
Baidu Translate API, click \"Manage Baidu Translate API\" below to set up the API, where you can also view the API application tutorial (there is a free call quota of 10,000 per month).
Tencent Cloud\'s translation API, click \"Manage Tencent Cloud API\" below to set up the API, where you can also view the API application tutorial (there is a free call quota of 10,000 per month).
(Advanced settings) Customize the Cloud Text Translation API
Manage custom cloud text translation API1
Manage custom cloud text translation API2
Manage custom cloud text translation API3
Current Translation Mode：Local OCR Recognition + Text Translation
Current Translation Mode：Upload Images Directly for Translation
(Advanced settings) Customize the Cloud Image Translation API
Manage custom cloud image translation API1
Manage custom cloud image translation API2
Manage custom cloud image translation API3

It looks like you have selected NLLB as the translation API, but it seems that your device has less than 8G of RAM, which may cause problems when inferring the model. Please rest assured that the program will not prevent you from using the model, but there is no guarantee that there will be no accidents when the RAM is less than 8G.
Custom API does not support language selection

It looks like you are using a custom translation API. In this case, you should not use MoeTranslate to select the source and target languages. Instead, you should write the source and target languages ​​into the API because MoeTranslate does not know the language codes specified by your custom API (some API providers do not use BCP-47 codes as their language codes).
Please fill in the API information completely

MoeTranslate can use the API of Baidu Translate or Tencent Cloud to provide translation services, which means you need to apply for the API from the corresponding platform. The API platform you have selected now seems to be Baidu Translate. Click \"Go Now\" to start applying for the Baidu Translate API. For detailed tutorials on applying for the Baidu Translate API, click \"View Tutorial\". Please note that the application of these APIs is free, and there are tens of thousands of free calls per month.\nOf course, if you think the steps to apply for the API are too cumbersome, MoeTranslate also provides click-to-use translation options, such as ML Kit and NLLB Translation, which also have good translation results.

MoeTranslate can use Baidu Translate or Tencent Cloud\'s API to provide translation services, which means you need to apply for the API from the corresponding platform. The API platform you have selected now seems to be Tencent Cloud. Click \"Go Now\" to start applying for Tencent Cloud API. For detailed tutorials on applying for Tencent Cloud API, click \"View Tutorial\". Please note that the application of these APIs is free, and there are tens of thousands of free calls per month. Of course, if you think the steps to apply for the API are too cumbersome, MoeTranslate also provides click-to-use translation options, such as ML Kit and NLLB Translation, which also have good translation results.
